title: Lab Results Notifier
summary: Sends patients secure result notifications; reduces inbound calls by 50%.

faq.a: Most agents are live in 3–7 days once we connect your tools.
Telegram out of the box; WhatsApp via Twilio; Viber/FB on request.
No. Agents remove repetitive work so your team can focus on value.
We support multiple languages including English, Spanish, French, and more.
We don’t store your customer data on our servers; we relay via secure APIs and can self-host on request.
